root: ^oUR BELOVED LAND OF @%-LELALALAND IS INFESTED WITH GOBBLE-LINS! SAVE US
^Can I interest you in a two for one hand sale? I'm overstalked

c-1: ^I'm not interested in your triangle schemes.

Bleep: ^You are so wise. Beep indeed. We're counting on you.

c-1: ^What a way with words. No go press x to kill the gooblyns

Goop: ^How dare you speak about my mother that way!

c-0: ^Fine. I will forgive you this time. Only if you kill the GOGblins
c-1: ^This is no way for a hero to act! I refuse to speak with you for any longer!

triangle: ^You never know when an extra eye could come in handy. How often do you use your eyes?
^I assure you, there are no scheming triangles. Pyramids on the other hand? Can't promise that.
often: ^See, you understand why you need a one for two deal on hair chuncks. So will you commit?
^That's so weird. Why would you admit that out loud?
commit: ^You know what? maybe I will. I've actually been thinking ever since I lost the love of my life in a tragic accident-
^I'm just going to go kill goblins now.
^Back on the topic of spider legs. how sick would that be? It's only $399,999.99 for a set of 7. A steal really.
